name: Crispy Roast
description: Large chunks of roasted meat. Small square grids are sliced into the meat skin before it is marinated, then placed in the oven — everyday ingredients, simple preparation, authentic flavor.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Crispy Roast
suspicious.description: Large chunks of roasted meat. Swiftly snatched from the choking black smoke, the roasted meat looks more like charcoal. Before the embers in the grill have faded, it's worth trying to make another batch.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 160 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Crispy Roast
normal.description: Large chunks of roasted meat. Small square grids are sliced into the meat skin before it is marinated, then placed in the oven — everyday ingredients, simple preparation, authentic flavor.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 194 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Crispy Roast
delicious.description: Large chunks of roasted meat. The moment it comes out of the oven, the rich, meaty aroma fills your soul. No wonder so many people from Nod-Krai say this roasted meat is like the warm sun when the cold falls and the biting winds blow.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' ATK by 228 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
